00008 module execute

00010   use global
00011   use particle,  only: particle_init
00012   use pdfs
00013   use random_number_generator, only: initialize_rng
00014 
00015   implicit none
00016 
00017 ! Uncomment this if diagnostic output is needed.  Note, this requires -cpp.
00018 !#define DEBUG
00019 
00020 contains

00022   !=============================================================================
00025   subroutine run_problem()
00026 
00027     integer :: n  ! history loop counter
00028 
00029     ! initialize the random number generator
00030     call initialize_rng()
00031 
00032     ! begin history loop
00033     HISTORY: do n = 1, nhist
00034 
00035                         ! initialize the random number generator for this history
00036                         call initialize_rng_history(n)
00037 
00038       ! initialize particle
00039       call particle_init(neutron, geo%length)
00040 
00041 #ifdef DEBUG
00042      print *,'Neutron BORN'
00043      print *,'Neutron is at x:', neutron%xloc
00044      print *,'Neutron mu is:', neutron%mu
00045 #endif
00046 
00047       ! reset track tallies
00048       call reset_tallies()
00049 
00050       ! determine which slab the particle is in
00051       neutron%slab = get_slab_id()
00052 
00053 #ifdef DEBUG
00054       print *,'neutron is slab:', neutron%slab
00055 #endif
00056 
00057       ! begin loop around particle's life
00058       LIFE: do while (neutron%alive)
00059 
00060         ! tranpsort neutron
00061         call transport(n)
00062 
00063         ! get interaction type
00064         if(neutron%alive) call interaction()
00065 
00066       end do LIFE
00067 
00068       ! bank tallies
00069       call bank_tallies()
00070 
00071       ! update user
00072       if ( mod(n, 100000) == 0 ) then
00073         write(*,'("Successfully transported: ",I0," particles...")') n
00074       end if
00075 
00076     end do HISTORY
00077 
00078   end subroutine run_problem
00079 
00080   !=============================================================================
00083   subroutine transport(n)
00084     integer :: n
00085     double precision :: s     ! free flight distance
00086     double precision :: newx  ! the temp newx location
00087     double precision :: neig  ! nearest neighbor surface in traveling direction
00088     logical :: resample ! resample the distance
00089 
00090     ! set resample
00091     resample = .true.
00092 
00093     ! begin while loop until collide
00094     do while (resample)
00095 
00096       ! get the distance to next collision
00097       s = get_collision_distance(mat%totalxs)
00098 
00099 #ifdef DEBUG
00100       print *,'s =',s
00101 #endif
00102 
00103       ! compute x component
00104       newx = neutron%xloc + neutron%mu * s
00105 
00106 #ifdef DEBUG
00107       print *,'newx =',newx
00108 #endif
00109 
00110       ! get nearest neigbor
00111       if (neutron%mu > 0.0) then
00112         neig = float(neutron%slab)*geo%dx
00113       else
00114         neig = float(neutron%slab - 1)*geo%dx
00115       end if
00116 
00117 #ifdef DEBUG
00118       print *,'Neighbor is:',neig
00119 #endif
00120 
00121       ! check for surface crossing
00122       if ( (neutron%mu < 0.0 .and. newx < neig) .or.                           &
00123            (neutron%mu > 0.0 .and. newx > neig) ) then
00124 
00125         ! check for global boundary crossing
00126         if ( (newx < 0.0 .and. neutron%slab == 1) .or.                         &
00127               newx > geo%length .and. neutron%slab == geo%n_slabs) then
00128 
00129           ! kill particle
00130           neutron%alive = .false.
00131 
00132           ! no resample needed
00133           resample = .false.
00134 
00135         end if
00136 
00137         ! record tally
00138         tal(neutron%slab)%track = tal(neutron%slab)%track +                    &
00139                                   (neig - neutron%xloc) / neutron%mu
00140 
00141         ! move particle to surface and resample
00142         neutron%xloc = neig
00143 
00144         ! change slab number
00145         if (neutron%mu > 0.0) then
00146           neutron%slab = neutron%slab + 1
00147         else
00148           neutron%slab = neutron%slab - 1
00149         end if
00150 
00151       else ! collision occurred
00152 
00153         ! record distance in tally
00154         tal(neutron%slab)%track = tal(neutron%slab)%track + s 
00155 
00156         ! move neutron
00157         neutron%xloc = newx
00158 
00159         ! set resample to false
00160         resample = .false.
00161 
00162 #ifdef DEBUG
00163         print *,'Collision occurred move neutron to:', neutron%xloc
00164 #endif
00165 
00166       end if
00167 
00168     end do 
00169 
00170   end subroutine transport
00171 
00172   !=============================================================================
00175   subroutine interaction()
00176 
00177     integer :: id
00178 
00179     ! get reaction type
00180     id = get_collision_type(mat%absxs, mat%scattxs, mat%totalxs)
00181 
00182     if ( id == 1 ) then
00183 
00184 #ifdef DEBUG
00185       print *,'Neutron absorbed'
00186 #endif
00187 
00188       ! kill particle
00189       neutron%alive = .false.
00190 
00191     else
00192 
00193 #ifdef DEBUG
00194       print *,'Neutron scattered'
00195 #endif
00196 
00197       ! sample new angle
00198       neutron%mu = get_scatter_mu()
00199 
00200 #ifdef DEBUG
00201       print *,'New angle:',neutron%mu
00202 #endif
00203 
00204     end if
00205 
00206   end subroutine interaction

00212   function get_slab_id()
00213 
00214     integer :: get_slab_id
00215 
00216     get_slab_id = ceiling(neutron%xloc / geo%dx)
00217 
00218   end function get_slab_id

00223   subroutine reset_tallies()
00224 
00225     use tally, only: tally_reset
00226 
00227     integer :: i
00228 
00229     ! loop around and reset
00230     do i = 1,geo%n_slabs
00231 
00232       call tally_reset(tal(i))
00233 
00234     end do 
00235 
00236   end subroutine reset_tallies
00237 
00238   !=============================================================================
00241   subroutine bank_tallies()
00242 
00243     use tally, only: bank_tally
00244 
00245     integer :: i  ! counter
00246 
00247     ! begin loop around tallies
00248     do i = 1, geo%n_slabs
00249 
00250       ! bank tally
00251       call bank_tally(tal(i))
00252 
00253     end do
00254 
00255   end subroutine bank_tallies

00257   !=============================================================================
00260   subroutine print_tallies()
00261 
00262     use tally, only: perform_statistics
00263 
00264     integer :: i
00265 
00266     ! set results
00267     write(*,'(///,"Results",/,"=======",/)')
00268 
00269     do i = 1, geo%n_slabs
00270 
00271       ! compute stat
00272       call perform_statistics(tal(i), nhist, geo%dx)
00273 
00274       ! print mean
00275       write(*,'("Slab ",I0,T10," Flux: ",F0.4)') i, tal(i)%mean
00276 
00277     end do
00278 
00279   end subroutine print_tallies
